A few days later, Shuri came to my house.%K%P
We were here to discuss our new plan of attack.%K%P
'I still think I need to improve my dancing\nif I'm going to get through this audition.'%K%P
We had completely different views on how to proceed.%K%P
Shuri was convinced she needed to strengthen\nher weaker skills, while I thought it would be better\nto emphasize her strong points.%K%P
'Do you think you can get as good as Kagura\nin the time you've got left?'%K%P
'I won't know unless I try.\nI'll put everything into it and make it work out.'%K%P
'You're already trying to do the impossible again.\nThat attitude of yours gets you into trouble.'%K%P
'But...'%K%P
Shuri had a tendency to try to power through\nany problem she came up against.%K%P
I'd already seen how disastrously things could\nturn out when she used that approach.%K%P
'I think you're charming enough already\nwithout forcing yourself.\nWhy not focus on maximizing your best traits?'%K%P
'Ch-charming? ...Yamato, you say\nembarrassing things sometimes, you know.'%K%P
'If that's what you think, you won't mind\nexplaining exactly what is so charming about me,\nwill you?'%K%P
Blushing from ear to ear, Shuri fired\na challenge back at me.%K%P
'OK, sure. I'll list your good points one by one.'%K%P
'First off, you're a great singer.\nSara's voice may be more polished, but when you sing\nyou always touch the hearts of your audience.'%K%P
'You're also gorgeous.\nYou might not be aware of it yourself,\nbut when it comes to looks you're top notch.'%K%P
'Then there's the cute way you react to every little\nthing. It makes you seem kinda innocent\nand makes people want to protect you.'%K%P
'Oh, and the way you're shy, and hardworking,\nyou care about your sister so much,\nyou're considerate, and you always try your best...'%K%P
'And that's why I... Like you.'%K%P
I got so carried away that my feelings slipped out.%K%P
But I wasn't lying or trying to suck up to her.\nSo I didn't regret what I said.%K%P
'Huh? You... Like me...?'%K%P
'That sounded as if you were asking me out...'%K%P
Shuri's face instantly went bright red.%K%P
'It sounded that way because that's how I meant it.'%K%P
I'd come this far, there was no backing down now.%K%P
It was time to face my feelings for Shuri head on.%K%P
'Shuri, I like you!'%K%P
'Uh... Well...'%K%P
Going for broke, I threw my arms around her.%K%P
Shuri cried out in surprise at my sudden embrace.%K%P
I guess things were moving too fast.%K%P
But this was how she made me feel.\nI thought of her as a girl and not a goddess,\nand I wanted her as my girlfriend.%K%P
'Will you go out with me?\nAs one guy to one girl I like you, Shuri Kisshouten.'%K%P
I did my best to get my feelings across,\nwith my words and my actions.%K%P
I hugged Shuri even tighter and whispered\nmy confession of love in her ear.%K%P
'Uhh...'%K%P
'You really like me, just as a girl...?'%K%P
Shuri mumbled happily from within my embrace.%K%P
'Yeah. More than a goddess or an idol,\nI think of you as a beautiful, amazing girl.'%K%P
'...You know this isn't exactly\nthe best time for all this, right?'%K%P
'Actually, I think it is.\nWe could achieve much more together\nas boyfriend and girlfriend.'%K%P
'I guess that might give me an edge in the audition.'%K%P
'But don't get the wrong idea.\nI'm not looking at this as a business arrangement.'%K%P
'You shared your own heartfelt feelings with me\nso allow me to at least do the same.'%K%P
Shuri pushed away from me for a moment\nand composed herself.%K%P
My heart was in my mouth while I waited\nfor her answer.%K%P
'Ahem... Well...'%K%P
Perhaps she was nervous, too, the way\nshe kept fidgeting and clearing her throat.%K%P
Her cheeks dyed a vibrant red, Shuri looked\nme right in the eyes.%K%P
'Yamato... I like you, too.'%K%P
'So... I will be your girlfriend.'%K%P
'In fact, speaking as one girl to one guy,\nI want to be your girlfriend...'%K%P
'Or, you know, something like that. W-was that okay?'%K%P
...She said yes.%K%P
I was stunned. I was the one who'd started all this\nbut I never thought it would go this well.%K%P
'Hey, Yamato?\nWhy are you freezing up all of a sudden?'%K%P
'Oh! Sorry. I'm just kinda in shock.'%K%P
'Is it really that much of a surprise?'%K%P
'Yeah, more than I can put into words. I mean,\nyou're a goddess and I'm a human, you know?\nYou don't hear about this happening every day.'%K%P
'Don't be so melodramatic.\nAren't you the one who said think of me\nas a girl first, not a goddess?'%K%P
'I guess I did.'%K%P
'I'll say it once more.\nYes, I will go out with you.'%K%P
'I hope you'll continue to support me from now on...\nAs my boyfriend.'%K%P
'You know I will, Shuri.'%K%P
And so, Shuri and I officially became an item.%K%P
I still had some misgivings about the human-deity\nromance issue, but they soon gave way to supreme\njoy that such a stunning girl was going out with me.%K%P
This was the start of a dreamy, romantic\nnew chapter of my life.%K%P
...Or so I thought. Those naive hopes\nwere crushed pretty quickly.%K%P
'Yamato, more soda!'%K%P
'Coming right up.'%K%P
We'd bought some soft drinks to toast our\nnew relationship.%K%P
We munched on some snacks,\nand had our own little private party.%K%P
'Y'know what, Yamato?\nMy sister can be a real jerk sometimes.'%K%P
Shuri'd been griping for a while now.\nNone of these drinks were alcoholic, but it was\nlike she was a bad drunk.%K%P
Not that I was going to complain if she'd opened her\nheart toward me enough to talk about things she\nusually kept to herself.%K%P
'She's always treating me like a little kid...\nI mean, it's nice that she cares, but she's\nway too overprotective, y'know?'%K%P
'Even Kagura's been babying me lately.\nDo I really seem that unreliable?\nAm I that much of a kid?'%K%P
'No, of course not.\nYou're totally a responsible adult.'%K%P
'Right? Right?\nGeez, no one else seems to understand.'%K%P
'You are the only one that gets me, Yamato.\nSo you get a gold star!'%K%P
Shuri traced a star on my cheek with her finger.%K%P
It was a weird sensation, but not in a bad way.%K%P
'Everyone thinks I'm such a kid,\nbut I'm the only one with a proper boyfriend.%K%P
'We're not gonna lose to any of those\nSINGLE goddesses!'%K%P
Shuri wrapped herself around my arm as if to\nemphasize that we were a couple. Not that any\nof her rivals were there to see it.%K%P
I'd been so nervous when I asked her out that\nI hadn't thought much about what I said,\nbut I really did consider Shuri a regular girl.%K%P
A regular girl with lovely soft skin and who\nsmelled really good up close.%K%P
'Yamato? Is something wrong?'%K%P
'It's just starting to hit me that you really are\nmy girlfriend.'%K%P
'Oh... I... Sorry.'%K%P
It seemed like she was finally 'sobering up.'%K%P
Even so, she didn't pull away.%K%P
'We're... Boyfriend and girlfriend now, right?'%K%P
'Yep.'%K%P
'Do you mind if we stay like this a little longer?%K%P
'I was hoping you'd say that.'%K%P
'I'm glad to hear it.'%K%P
It seemed that Shuri was very much\nin favor of snuggling.%K%P
She seemed embarrassed, but still held close to me.%K%P
